oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Abstract of bullets and cartridges expended by Co. E, 2nd Tenn. Cav. USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Detailed count of ammunition and cartridges used by the unit in practice firing on May 2, 1864 and "in action near Decaturville" on June 27, 1864, signed by Capt. John Henry. Cartridges cited include those for Merril carbines and Colt Army pistols.; Capt. Henry organized Co. E at Sevierville (Tenn.) on September 16, 1862.
